Articles.Content: The Hill Nebula collapses into a ball.

Since ISS has a Klaw to grip on the ball-sized body, I went get it on a modified Soyuz spacecraft which also has a Klaw. Hence, mine and every single agency who participated in ISS's development.

Edited April 14, 2019 by FahmiRBLXian
...Nubs, it's a damn Star, Nebulas turn into Stars, My Star...

Yes, your damn Star.

Everybody avoids it, you're alone.

I crush your “Damn Hill” with a big egg.

My crack of doom.

I put the egg in a cake, and eat the cake

Technically, my cake.

I make Dres into a hill. 

My Dres hill.
I poo on the Dres hill (ok that's kinda icky) and shoot it with Phineas's megasizer. My cake poo engulfs the Dres hill. By LLOOGGIICC!, my Dres hill covered in poo.

A joint-venture mission between Kerbal Space Program, NASA, JAXA, Roscosmos, ESA, ISRO, SANSA, Angkasa and LAPAN sent a massively giant fleet of Road Sweepers, Cleaners, Medical Scentists, Medical Experts and Astronomers to Dres to clean and purify the poop-contaminated planet.

Our hill.

Edited April 16, 2019 by FahmiRBLXian
A life began. Its hill.

And it was me...Dio...

Dio's Hill

Then it gets cold, and everything gets frozen.
A Snowhill.

Dresothermal (Basically Geothermal on Dres) was discovered and heating stations, hot water pipes, saunas, hot tubs are built to heat up the planet to a safe, inhabitable but still cold for snow and ice to form (Around -5 Degrees Celcius) and Kerbal﻿﻿ Space Program, NASA, JAXA, Roscosmos, ESA, ISRO, SANSA, Angkasa and LAPAN, as well as SpaceX sent volunteers to colonize the planet with what has been constructed. Dres finally became a tourist attraction And SpaceX and Virgin Galactic used their BFR and SpaceShips One and Two to ferry people to and from Dres.

Our Hill. As well as the afforementioned space agencies and companies.

Underground ice melts.

A Mud Pit.

Creeping artillery barrage assault on your pit, and extensive air support allows me to storm the pit and capture it.

My fortified trench.

Someone portals in (yay Aperture Science) and steals your fortified trench. Apersure Science's trench. Trench is a trademark of Aperture Science dba Aperture blah blah blah.

On 4/16/2019 at 4:58 AM, FahmiRBLXian said:

Dresothermal (Basically Geothermal on Dres) was discovered and heating stations, hot water pipes, saunas, hot tubs are built to heat up the planet to a safe, inhabitable but still cold for snow and ice to form (Around -5 Degrees Celcius) and Kerbal﻿﻿ Space Program, NASA, JAXA, Roscosmos, ESA, ISRO, SANSA, Angkasa and LAPAN, as well as SpaceX sent volunteers to colonize the planet with what has been constructed. Dres finally became a tourist attraction And SpaceX and Virgin Galactic used their BFR and SpaceShips One and Two to ferry people to and from Dres.

Our Hill. As well as the afforementioned space agencies and companies.

Nerdy.

I shout flame out of my hands and burn your trench to a crisp.

My hill and demolished defenses.

I use cleaning gel (which is just water) to wash away the ash. You are in debt to me. So I get the hill. My hill.

P.S. I also hire some Sentry Turrets to guard the hill

Edited April 17, 2019 by HansonKerman
Blackout. The hired Sentry Turrets are on strike.
I hire new turrets and take back the hill. My hill.
I configure ur turrets to turn against you and GIMME BACK MA HILL. MA HILL. MINE.

Nukes.

My irradiated cleaned-poop Mega-Dres hill.

I slam an asteroid into the hill.

My Dres regolith crater.

The central peak of the regolith crater.

Spoiler

 

Edited April 18, 2019 by kerbiloid

I smashed another Asteroid to it...

My Crater inside The Regolith Crater...
